Do not <S%H3372>fear,<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he is.

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H884>Beersheba;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> of them <S%H7650>took<s%> an <S%H7650>oath.<s%>
